job.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (Remote)
job.description: stronguAbout Inception HealthbrbrustrongOur goal is to transform healthcarebrbrWe improve the health of individuals and communities through the use of digital technology Inception Health brings together the best aspects of innovation accelerators an outsidein mindset and resources to rapidly test and scale digital health solutionsbrbrWe work hard to define the problem and we use design thinking and humancentered design to understand the issues from all perspectivesbrbrInception serves as a Catalyst an Incubator a DesignerDeveloper and an Operator of solutionsbrbrJoin the firstofitskind digital engineering group at Inception Health You will be working delivering greenfield products as well as shaping our engineering culture This is a unique opportunity if you are excited to transform healthcare and shape the future of carebrbrAt Inception we aim to build a thriving engineering team focused on delivering a datadriven and experiencefocused digital services to our members community and providersbrbrThat means we aspire to bring a fullstack engineering culture as our philosophy to grow our engineering team and build a crossfunctional resiliency of our members to dive in and help engineer experience across the technology stack layersbrbrstronguThe JobbrustrongulliWrite code build tests resolve bugs and refactorliliSolve healthcare challenges and DevSecOpsliliContribute to research and development in various areas of engineeringbrliulWe truly believe that this is an opportunity for candidates to bring their unique value to healthcare to make change At Inception Health you can innovate and build sophisticated solutions that enrich thousands of livesbrbrstronguThe Right FitbrustrongulliSoftware development experience in one or more how different things interact and work togetherbrliulstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongYoure an outstanding fullstack engineer with a knowledge in the following areasbrulliSoftware development coding modern eventbased architecture leveraging GraphQL Relay and modern Serverless backend technologyliliTesting unit testing integration testing performance testing everything testing with tools like Jest Detox Cypress K8 etcbrliulstronguOther Qualifications IncludebrustrongulliPassionate about healthcare and want to build technology that makes it more accessible and modernliliPassionate
